snippet.title: Hackers to NSA chief: Read the Constitution
snippet.description: The head of the NSA faces a tough audience as he appeals to hackers and security professionals at Black Hat 2013 to help the U.S. government build better spying tools.

snippet.title: Microsoft: U.S. Constitution is 'suffering' from NSA secrecy
snippet.description: A strongly worded letter from Microsoft's general counsel to Attorney General Eric Holder says secrecy about National Security Agency surveillance is harming fundamental "constitutional principles."

snippet.title: Lavabit founder says he fought feds to protect the Constitution
snippet.description: In a sit-down at CNET headquarters, Lavabit CEO Ladar Levison discusses the legal bureaucracy the US government employed to try to force him to become complicit with NSA surveillance.

snippet.title: Lavabit founder says he fought feds to protect the Constitution
snippet.description: In a sit-down at CNET headquarters, Lavabit CEO Ladar Levison discusses the legal bureaucracy the US government employed to try to force him to become complicit with NSA surveillance.

snippet.title: Icelanders 'like' their crowdsourced constitution
snippet.description: A year after Iceland asked its citizens to help write its new constitution by making suggestions via Facebook, voters decide this new draft should be the basis for the upcoming constitution.

snippet.title: Italy probes alleged Apple tax fraud
snippet.description: The iPhone and iPad maker is accused of hiding more than $1.3 billion from the European country's taxman, according to reports.

snippet.title: Windows Phone gains momentum, overtakes iOS in Italy
snippet.description: The operating system now makes up one in 10 smartphone sales across Europe, but Android still own 72 percent of that market.

snippet.title: McLaren MP4-12C: Britain Vs. Italy
snippet.description: McLaren is all about world leading tech and besting its competitors on the race track, but it's been a while since it made its very own road car. Does the 12C have what it takes to beat Italy's offerings to submission?

snippet.title: Eric Schmidt shows off the Moto X at conference in Italy
snippet.description: Google's chairman has been snapped using the much-rumoured handset at a business conference in Italy.

snippet.title: Apple shelves AppleCare warranty product in Italy
snippet.description: Apple is no longer selling its AppleCare warranty add-on service in its Italian retail stores where consumers already get two years of warranty.
